snippet: Eva S. Moskowitz, who built a chain of charter schools during the Bloomberg administration, saw plans for three more canceled by Mayor Bill de Blasio.
abstract: Eva S Moskowitz, who built a chain of charter schools in New York City during the Bloomberg administration, is locked in combat with Mayor Bill de Blasio; she has seen plans for three more schools canceled by him; de Blasio, who singled Moskowitz out on the campaign trail as the embodiment of what he saw was wrong in schooling, has followed his word with deed.

byline.original: By AL BAKER and JAVIER C. HERNÁNDEZ
byline.contributor: Thomas Kaplan, Jesse McKinley and Marc Santora contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Eva S. Moskowitz, who built a chain of charter schools during the Bloomberg administration, saw plans for three more canceled by Mayor Bill de Blasio.

headline.main: De Blasio and Operator of Charter School Empire Do Battle
headline.print_headline: Mayor and Operator of Charter Schools Do Battle in Albany
